alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Pennington; Red Lake; West Marshall; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Marshall, northwestern Red Lake, north central Polk and western Pennington Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Old Mill State Park to Carpenters Corner to 6 miles northeast of Euclid. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thief River Falls, Newfolden, St. Hilaire, Viking, Holt, Rosewood and Hazel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Pennington; Red Lake; West Marshall; West Polk
